<h3 id="X10914">X(10914)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-GARCIA AND INNER-JOHNSON</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^2-4*a*b*c-(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*(b+c)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(10914) = r*X(4)+(2*R-r)*X(8)</b>
<p>X(10914) lies on these lines:{1,474}, {2,3885}, {4,8}, {5,6735}, {10,11}, {35,5541}, {40,956}, {65,519}, {78,1482}, {100,1385}, {145,942}, {169,4513}, {200,5730}, {210,3626}, {354,3244}, {374,2325}, {405,1697}, {443,9874}, {484,5288}, {518,3632}, {528,10572}, {529,1770}, {551,3918}, {758,3625}, {936,7962}, {944,10167}, {946,6736}, {958,5119}, {960,3679}, {997,2098}, {1018,1212}, {1125,3698}, {1155,8666}, {1201,4695}, {1259,10679}, {1320,6797}, {1483,10202}, {1709,4915}, {1737,3813}, {1953,3694}, {2093,6762}, {2099,3811}, {2262,2321}, {2646,8715}, {2886,10039}, {2932,6264}, {2975,3579}, {3241,5045}, {3245,6763}, {3254,4553}, {3295,3895}, {3306,7373}, {3339,4900}, {3340,6765}, {3501,4051}, {3612,4421}, {3617,3877}, {3621,3868}, {3623,5049}, {3624,10179}, {3633,5902}, {3634,3898}, {3635,3922}, {3678,4669}, {3730,4875}, {3876,4678}, {3881,3919}, {3890,9780}, {3899,4539}, {3931,10459}, {3940,8148}, {3953,4674}, {3962,4701}, {3983,4691}, {4005,4746}, {4188,5126}, {4193,7743}, {4511,6946}, {4533,4662}, {4640,5258}, {4677,5904}, {4855,10246}, {5084,9785}, {5123,7741}, {5250,9708}, {5552,5886}, {5554,5722}, {5587,10893}, {5603,6964}, {5657,6926}, {5686,7673}, {5690,6734}, {5727,9844}, {5728,5853}, {5795,10624}, {5818,10598}, {5828,9779}, {5881,6001}, {5882,10609}, {6967,10527}, {6975,9956}, {7966,8726}, {7967,9940}, {8069,8668}, {8193,10829}, {9857,10871}, {10791,10794}</p>
<p>
X(10914) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {65,3893}, {3621,3868}<br>
X(10914) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1,5836), (72,8), (145,942), (1320,6797), (3057,10), (3244,3754), (3555,65), (3878,3626), (3885,9957), (3899,4711), (5697,960), (7982,7686), (10284,9956), (10624,5795)<br>
X(10914) = anticomplement of X(9957)<br>
X(10914) = complement of X(3885)<br>
X(10914) = X(145)-of-X(1)-Brocard-triangle<br>
X(10914) = X(1317)-of-inner-Garcia-triangle<br>
X(10914) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,1706,474), (1,3753,5439), (1,3987,3752), (1,5687,5440), (1,5836,3753), (2,3885,9957), (8,962,3421), (8,3434,355), (8,5082,3419), (10,3057,392), (40,956,3916), (40,4853,956), (100,4861,1385), (200,7982,5730), (960,3679,3697), (1376,10912,1), (1697,9623,405), (1706,3680,1), (3244,3754,354), (3434,10522,10525), (3617,3877,5044), (3617,5044,3921), (3626,3878,210), (3679,5697,960), (3698,5919,1125), (3813,8256,1737), (3899,4711,4539), (4662,5692,4533), (4668,5692,4662), (4691,10176,3983)<br>
